title: Textile, 1960–70
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: screen printed on plain weave foundation
inscribed: on attached label: Current reproduction on 50" ENGLISH LINEN SCREEN PRINTED (reduced in scale to accomodate narrower width).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 84.5 x 65 cm (33 1/4 x 25 9/16 in.)

description: Two birds on a rock with bird in a tree above. Mostly brown and olive green. Grommets with velcro at top.
